textAreaPlaceHolder.en-US:
write a message... Just don’t forget that they see everything...
Try the following devilish signs: @ / #
textAreaPlaceHolder.pt-PT:
escreva uma mensagem... Só não se esqueça de que eles veem tudo...
Experimente os seguintes sinais diabólicos: @ / #
textAreaPlaceHolder.pt-BR:
escreva uma mensagem... Só não se esqueça de que eles veem tudo...
Experimente os seguintes sinais demoníacos: @ / #
textAreaPlaceHolder.de-DE:
Schreibe eine Nachricht... Vergiss nur nicht, dass sie alles sehen...
Probiere die folgenden teuflischen Zeichen aus: @ / #
textAreaPlaceHolder.uk-UA:
напишіть повідомлення... Тільки не забудьте, що вони все бачать...
Спробуйте такі диявольські знаки: @ / #
textAreaPlaceHolder.ne-NP:
सन्देश लेख्नुहोस्... बस यति मात्र नभुल्नुहोस् कि उनीहरू सबै हेर्छन्...
यी दानवी चिन्हहरू प्रयास गर्नुहोस्: @ / #

helpMessage/.en-US:
Use one of those cmds:
/G - create a new Game
/F - change friendship status
/B - block user
/U - unblock user

helpMessage/G0.en-US:
(1/3) Create a game
Choose a map e.g. /G,ufo,
ufo
lizard-people
snowman
lochness

helpMessage/G2.en-US:
(2/3) Create a game
Wanna play with powerups? e.g. /G,ufo,yes,
yes
no

helpMessage/G3.en-US:
(3/3) Create a game
Press return to create the game

helpMessage/F.en-US:
Modify friendship
Choose an option e.g. /FS
S - Send a friend request
C - Cancel the pending friend request
A - Accept the pending friend request
R - Reject the pending friend request
U - Unfriend

helpMessage/F1.en-US:
Modify friendship
Press return to apply change of friendship status
